sentence: But the third debate is expected to also include two lesser known candidates Catherine Davis and Kandiss Taylor.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Gov. Kemp and Trump-backed challenger Perdue to face off at debates

sentence: Besides Kemp and Perdue, the primary includes Republicans Catherine Davis, Kandiss Taylor and Tom Williams, who were excluded from Sunday's debate.
author: Associated Press
title: Sparks fly in Georgia GOP gubernatorial debate: Perdue adamant 2020 election was stolen
